channel.title: How do i make npcs talk or change wut that say
channel.description: i have some servers and the npcs say stuf i dont want them can u tell me where to go to edit what they say itl be greatly apreaciated. ;D

item.title: How do i make npcs talk or change wut that say
item.dc:creator: @Wildcat_240 Wildcat_240
item.description:
@Wildcat_240 wrote:

Let me explain that a little more in-depth for you…
Do what he said in the Begging “Go into Npchandler.java” and search for what they are currently saying example: selling rares. and either edit what they are currently saying. To make a brand new npc say something, after adding the npc in autospawn.cfg, add this: []if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCIDHERE { if (misc.random2(22) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOURTEXTHERE!"; } }
The [] means to tab it for some reason you cant tab on these forums

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npcs talk or change wut that say

item.title: How do i make npcs talk or change wut that say
item.dc:creator: @tr3v0r TR3V0R
item.description:
@tr3v0r wrote:

Go to “Npchandler” and search for what they say and you can change what they say or make new things.

Read full topic
